dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chapter?

emptyStates.noClassroomsDescription: Create your first classroom to start organizing sessions and managing student enrollments.

form.title: Create Classroom
form.studentCountMin: Number of students must be at least 1!
form.startDateAfterEndDate: Start date cannot be after end date!
form.isFreeDescription: If selected, this classroom will be provided free of charge to students
form.priceDescription: Base price of the classroom (1-on-1 usually has higher price than group classes)
form.discountPriceDescription: Discount price must be less than base price
form.discountPriceMustBeLessThanPrice: Discount price must be less than base price!
form.discountPriceNotAllowedForFree: Cannot set discount price for free classes!

session.addScheduleRequired: Please add at least one schedule

detail.startTimeInPast: Start time cannot be in the past

detail.sessionTooShort: Session duration must be at least 15 minutes
detail.confirmDeleteSession: Are you sure you want to delete this session?
detail.deleteSessionWarning: This action cannot be undone. All session data will be permanently deleted.
detail.noStudents: No students enrolled in this classroom

dialog.selectExistingClassroom: Select an existing classroom to continue.

dialog.priceRequired: Price is required and must be greater than 0

sessionDetail.title: Title
sessionDetail.removeStudentMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this student from the class?
sessionDetail.deleteVideoMessage: Are you sure you want to delete video "{name}"? The uploaded video will be removed from the system.
sessionDetail.deleteSessionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this session? The system may automatically generate a new session to compensate according to the class schedule.
sessionDetail.removeStudentAndOrderSuccess: Student and order removed from class successfully
sessionDetail.missingUploadUrl: Upload URL not received from server
sessionDetail.confirmRemoveStudentMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this student from the class?
sessionDetail.deleteOrderDescription:
If you accidentally added a student and want to delete the order as well so revenue is not incorrect, select this option.
By default only enrollment is deleted, order will be marked as "cancelled".
